remarks: Separate out a term in a finite product.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
statement:
fprodsplit1.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) $.
fprodsplit1.b $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. CC ) $.
fprodsplit1.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. A ) $.
fprodsplit1.d $e |- ( ( ph /\ k = C ) -> B = D ) $.
fprodsplit1 $p |- ( ph -> prod_ k e. A B = ( D x. prod_ k e. ( A \ { C } ) B ) ) $.
$d A k $.
$d C k $.
$d D k $.
$d k ph $.
